name: Munchies
description:
What's up My Dudes!!!!
Your Friendly, Neighborhood, Gamer, Game Dev Is Here!!!

MUNCHIES
A Horror Survival Looter/Shooter With Base Building and Raiding

Warning!!! This game is Super Early Access!!!!
To stay ahead of the "Asset Flipper" Comments:
I am Me and My Team so far Is One Other Guy. I have Hundreds Of hours and Dollars Invested In this game and have lots of plans for it going forward.
Join The Community For Exclusive Rewards, Updates, Testing Events and Much More!!

https://discord.gg/S6dwXe8p9X
(Game Not Required To Join Discord)
Watch the game develop and get access to Exclusive Rewards and Content
